column5: This 7 year old didn't want to go to church so bad he stole his parents car to get away.  I love at the end when he runs from the cops  Have a great long weekend everyone    Joey
AHAHA saw this on BT , it was pretty funny , it looks like a normal driver , until the door opens ahah
It don't matter....even if he goes to hell, he's too wet to burn eh?
HAHAHA! Why didnt I think of that when I was his age?!?!?
That was pretty awesome and funny, I'm impressed with the kid's driving skills!
Too funny...  Hopefully the parents realize they need to do a better job teaching him right from wrong....
A kid doing that, I think its already too late. The parents need the teaching
Notice how the cop had his hand on his holster when he followed the kid??!!  HAHAHAH!!  thanks doll HD

Gotta teach the kids easier ways to get out of church...lol All I had to do was ask for a logical explanation of the whole Noah's Arc thing and how they overcome recessive gene issues by only taking 2 of each. Yeah i was a smartass even at the age of 7.
I see the cops are learning.  They Taser them off camera now.

If you're able to secure a few pics of your priest/minister/rabbi dressing a pig in cute clothing, you can probably  get away with never going to service for the rest of your life. However, spending a little time in your place of worship is not a bad idea.
